div.div: API Styles Comparison: REST vs GraphQL vs gRPC vs WebSocket

switch.text: API Styles Comparison: REST vs GraphQL vs gRPC vs WebSocket

div.div:
• Resource-based (nouns in URLs)
• Stateless communication
• Multiple endpoints
• HTTP verbs (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
• Cacheable responses
• Standard HTTP status codes

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 324px; margin-left: 22px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 346px; margin-left: 28px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Simple and widely understood
• Browser-friendly
• Excellent caching
• Easy debugging
• Mature ecosystem

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 324px; margin-left: 182px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 346px; margin-left: 188px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Over-fetching / under-fetching
• Multiple round trips
• Versioning complexity
• No real-time support
• Schema not enforced

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 439px; margin-left: 23px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Public APIs
• CRUD operations
• Web applications
• Mobile backends
• When caching is critical

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Single endpoint
• Client specifies data shape
• Strongly typed schema
• Introspection / self-documenting
• Query, Mutation, Subscription
• Nested data in one request

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 324px; margin-left: 392px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 346px; margin-left: 398px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• No over/under-fetching
• Single request for nested data
• Self-documenting
• Great developer experience
• Versioning not needed

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 324px; margin-left: 552px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Complex server implementation
• N+1 problem (DataLoader)
• Caching is harder
• Security concerns
• Learning curve

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 439px; margin-left: 393px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 303px; height: 1px; padding-top: 466px; margin-left: 398px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Complex data relationships
• Mobile apps (bandwidth)
• Aggregating microservices
• Rapid frontend development
• When flexibility is key

div.div:
• Binary protocol (fast)
• Strong typing (.proto schema)
• Code generation
• Bidirectional streaming
• Multiplexed connections
• Built-in auth, deadlines, cancellation

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 324px; margin-left: 762px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
• High performance
• Smaller payload size
• Streaming support
• Multi-language support
• Type safety

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 324px; margin-left: 922px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
• Not browser-native
• Less human-readable
• Steeper learning curve
• Complex debugging
• Limited tooling

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 439px; margin-left: 763px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

div.div:
• Microservices communication
• High-performance systems
• Real-time streaming
• Polyglot environments
• Internal service APIs

div.div:
• Persistent connection
• Full-duplex communication
• Low latency
• Event-driven
• Server push capability
• Flexible message format

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 324px; margin-left: 1132px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Real-time bidirectional
• Low overhead after handshake
• Server-initiated messages
• Browser native support
• Great for live updates

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 143px; height: 1px; padding-top: 324px; margin-left: 1292px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Connection management
• Scaling challenges
• No request/response pattern
• Reconnection logic needed
• Firewall/proxy issues

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 439px; margin-left: 1133px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Real-time chat applications
• Live dashboards/feeds
• Collaborative editing
• Online gaming
• Notifications

div.div:
• Public API → REST
• Mobile + Complex data → GraphQL
• Microservices → gRPC
• Real-time → WebSocket
• Mix → Use multiple!

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
